title: Slow cooker homemade tomato ketchup
ingredients: ['1.6L pureed tomatoes', '120ml water', '125g granulated sugar', '180ml white vinegar', '1 teaspoon onion granules', '1/2 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 3/4 teaspoons salt', '1/8 teaspoon celery salt', '1/8 teaspoon mustard powder', '1/4 teaspoon finely ground black pepper', '1 whole clove']
